text:
@realDonaldTrump BWAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!
You mindless, fucking hypocrite! YOU STOLE "Make America Great Again" from Reagan. And the closest thing you have to an "imagination" is when you dream up the stupidest ideas ever, like drinking & injecting disinfectant to cure #coronavirus. Go to bed, asshole!
